summary: This document details the forensic examination of an Apple iPad conducted by FBI Forensic Examiner John Chan on September 5, 2019. The examination involved unlocking the device and performing a file system extraction, which was subsequently uploaded for further analysis. The document emphasizes that it contains no recommendations or conclusions from the FBI.

persons.name: John Chan
persons.context: John Chan performed the forensic examination of the Apple iPad, including unlocking the device and extracting its file system.

events.title: Forensic Examination of Apple iPad
events.description: John Chan initiated an unlock and file system extraction on an Apple iPad as part of a forensic examination.

locations: New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: The forensic examination was conducted on an Apple iPad model A1823.
The unlock PIN for the device was verified as 0000.
A SHA256 hash was generated on the extraction file and saved.
All extraction files were uploaded to a case volume on NYCART server systems.
The document states it contains no recommendations or conclusions from the FBI.
